extendedInfo.description: NOTE: There is now an official White House app! Search for "White House" by "White House New Media". This app will no longer be updated. Thanks for all the support and feedback!- BenUnofficial portal to the White House.Pulls content from the official White House blog, photo galleries, YouTube channel, and Flickr photostream, as well as news  articles from Recovery.gov. Optional notifications when new content is posted.v0.5: - bug fixes - add support for small & large screens

reviews.comment: Made G1 go crazy. Blue lite where powr shld b, cnt answr fone bc ring & screen blck, ringtones changin w/out me, main bottom keys light up not in use
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: although this app had upgrade at google play develope to 6.4.1 or even higher.\n\ni still receieved correct news update daily for my phone 2.1.2

reviews.comment: I\'m not an Obama supporter, but this app is very well done and helps me keep track of what the administration is up to.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good app. Just like the website. It also like a previous reviewer only posts updates on a reboot.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Pinch size option to expand text would be helpful, but Nice App. Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: A cool app to stay on top of things but only tells me there are updates when I reboot my phone. DroidX
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Please allow for install on SD card. Will give higher rating when dev allows this feature.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Informative. Love links to YouTube since we don\'t have flash - yet.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I like the blog feature, but where\'s the featured legislation section of the website? This app works well but I wanted more lege information.

reviews.comment: The best way to keep track of Congress, The House, & anything Presidential. Love It!!

reviews.comment: This is great!

reviews.comment: This app is great. The app is very well designed. It has all the features but more are always welcome. People should not rate on polical views

reviews.comment: Website is better

reviews.comment: I don\'t normally post comments when rating an app but this one deserves more than 5 stars! Extremely well done!

reviews.comment: Ben good app.  I agree with Mo though, you really gotta be into politics.
